turns.content:
client sayed 
2. In the main menu (مواقعنا) page how to change (مفتوح حتي ١٠ مساء) it’s not right and it’s not exist with that way even in website as you take this info form website 

and my reply 
Returned closing time would appear on mobile app as it written from the dashboard.
If it is stored from dashboard in 12 time formate it would appear in mobile in 12 rime formate
Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We apologize for any confusion regarding the closing time displayed in the "مواقعنا" page.
please refrase my reply

Regarding the closing time displayed in the "مواقعنا" page, we apologize for any inaccuracies. The closing time displayed on the mobile app is sourced directly from the dashboard. If the closing time is stored on the dashboard in a 12-hour format, it will appear on the mobile app in the same format. We will make sure to rectify this issue and update the closing time accordingly.
You can control categories appearance from dashboard as sent in documentation but you cant control the order of categories in home page

We apologize for any confusion regarding the control of categories appearance on the home page. As per the documentation, you are able to control the appearance of categories by enabling or disabling them from being displayed on the home page. However, rearranging the order of categories on the home page is not currently covered within the scope of the project and would require additional work and a revision of the scope agreement.

7. The images for Some products it’s not work and it work in the 2 language in website for example check this product (find it in attachment point\_07)
network issue

We apologize for the issue with some product images not working as expected. We will look into this issue and try to find the root cause.
It could be a network issue, we will check the images and run some test to make sure that everything is working well.
Please let us know the product name and we will check it and get back to you with the results as soon as possible.
We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to resolve this issue.
Development team has developed the api as per your request in shared sheet. If you need to change it as in your last request please inform me

We wanted to inform you that our development team has developed the API according to the specifications provided in the shared sheet. However, if there are any changes that need to be made based on your last request, please let us know and we will make the necessary adjustments.
Please let us know if there's anything else we can do to help.
We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to deliver the final product that meets your requirements.

We wanted to inform you that our development team has developed the API according to the specifications provided in the shared sheet not accourding your last email. However, if there are any changes that need to be made, please let us know and we will make the necessary adjustments.

We wanted to inform you that our development team has developed the API according to the specifications provided in the shared sheet and not according to the last email received. If there are any changes that need to be made, please let us know and we will make the necessary adjustments as soon as possible. We apologize for any confusion and will do our best to ensure that the final product meets your requirements.
Please let us know if there's anything else we can do to help.
We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to deliver the final product that meets your requirements.
Our development team has solve the sdk issue and the order status changed after payment ot be processing

We wanted to inform you that our development team has resolved the issue with the SDK and the order status has been changed to "processing" after payment. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by this issue and are glad to have it resolved.
If there are any other issues or concerns, please let us know and we will do our best to address them.
We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to deliver a fully functional product that meets your requirements.
After intensive investigation on egyption and sadui numbers we found that it works fine and attached video for working senrio

We wanted to update you that after conducting an intensive investigation on the Egyptian and Saudi numbers, we have found that it is working as intended. Attached to this message is a video demonstrating a working scenario with Egyptian and Saudi numbers. We apologize for any confusion or inconvenience caused by this issue and are glad to have found a solution.
If there are any other issues or concerns, please let us know and we will do our best to address them.
We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to deliver a fully functional product that meets your requirements.

client claim there is an issue with 1. All the page in the main menu when you open it appear a transparent layer above it that included search field and others for some time and after finsish awhile this layer disappear
and we reply

Solved by AwadNahas team as issue was on website development not from mobile side

please rephrase it

We wanted to update you that the issue you reported with the transparency layer appearing above the main menu pages, including the search field, has been resolved by our team. It was determined that the issue was caused by a problem on the website development side and not on the mobile side. We apologize for any confusion or inconvenience caused by this issue and are glad to have it resolved.
Please let us know if there are any other issues or concerns you have and we will do our best to address them. We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to deliver a fully functional product that meets your requirements.
Mobile team has add response message from backend regaring validating coupon

We wanted to inform you that our mobile development team has implemented the feature of displaying a response message from the backend when validating coupons. This will allow users to receive feedback on whether their coupon code is valid or not. We apologize for any confusion or inconvenience caused by this issue and are glad to have it resolved.
Please let us know if there are any other issues or concerns you have and we will do our best to address them. We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to deliver a fully functional product that meets your requirements.

customer claims that The discount code if I put it right it don’t give me the discount percentage, but it was not inclused in design scope

my answer The discount amount has been added to cart screen

We apologize for any confusion regarding the discount code feature. As per our agreement, the calculation of the discount percentage based on the code entered was not included in the scope of the project. However, we understand that you are now requesting this feature. To proceed with this request, we would need to revise the scope of the project and discuss additional costs for this additional work.
We have added the feature that shows the discount amount that has been applied to the cart screen for user reference. Please let us know if there are any other concerns or issues you have and we will do our best to address them. We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to deliver a fully functional product that meets your requirements.

rephrase it:
Our infrastructure team has deployed and released the new setup three months ago, and has requested twice your decision regarding next move but unfortintly we didn’t received any reply from your side
So we consider the mission is complshed

however we recieved emails from cloud flare and aws that our cerdential has been revoked so that we are not responable for ht einfrasturcture

We wanted to inform you that our infrastructure team has successfully deployed and released a new setup three months ago and has reached out to you twice to discuss next steps. However, we have not received any response from your side. As such, we have assumed that the project has been completed.
We regret to inform you that we recently received notifications from Cloudflare and AWS that our credentials have been revoked and therefore we cannot be held responsible for the current infrastructure. We kindly request that you provide us with instructions on what steps to take next, as we are eager to help and resolve this issue.
what to write after email felivery

After sending the email, it's best to follow up with the customer after a few days to ensure they received and read the email. You can ask them if they have any questions or concerns about the information provided in the email. Additionally, you can inquire if there are any further actions needed on your part to resolve the issue. If there are no further actions needed, you can let them know that you will be available if they need any assistance in the future.
